title: HIDtoVPAD - WUPS
author: Maschell
description: Use a HID-Device as WiiU GamePad
details:
This version is HIDtoVPAD-WUPS-v0.1-nightly-9b4cce6 the version detailed in the additional info section is for update tracking purposes.

This APP is only for use with the WiiU plugin system Loader.

This is a little tool that let you use a hid device on the WiiU.
It's based on the controller_patcher engine.

for a more detailed description and instructions please refer to the source URL or https://github.com/Maschell/hid_to_vpad .
